title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: Just a feel good story here. He chose not to play in a wheelchair and his mates say he is really good. I hope he makes his loved ones proudÂ  https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11662889/Boy-13-born-without-LEGS-wins-place-schools-basketball-team.html

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Now, who can ever think that a young man born with no legs can be an inspiration to others. This shows the encouragement he has with himself and those around him that this is true greatness. The support system that he has, his mother, to his coach, and his teammates overcomes any barrier he has with his disability. He even scored with an opposing team in action. I just hope that they too can see he is simply reaching out for his dreams and is showing that no one can stop him.
